entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 04:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -36.2°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
